title: Understanding Mobile Learning Adoption Factors and Designing Blended Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Experience with Digital Device Usage
context.additional_context: Analysis of mobile learning adoption factors and blended learning design for language acquisition in digital device-provided environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain key factors influencing mobile learning adoption (performance expectancy, effort expectancy, social influence, facilitating conditions)
Learners can design and implement three or more types of mobile-based interactive activities in blended learning environments
Learners can develop and utilize survey instruments (5-point Likert scales) for measuring learner satisfaction
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
